channel.title: Puneet's Notes On Data & Software Engineering
channel.description: Recent content on Puneet's Notes On Data & Software Engineering

item.title: Load a CSV
item.description: # Import Pandas import pandas as pd #Load CSV file into a dataframe with Pandas df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv') #Output Dataframe df # Load a csv file with no headers df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv', header=None) df # Load a csv file with encoding - UTF-8 df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv', encoding='UTF-8') df # Load a csv file with specific column names df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv', names=['Username', 'ID', 'First Name', 'Last Name']) df # Write dataframe to csv df.
